title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.9 - Exercise of religious beliefs by prisoners in segregation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.9 - Exercise of religious beliefs by prisoners in segregation

State Regulations

Prisoners confined in administrative or punitive
segregation shall not be prohibited from exercising their religious beliefs
consistent with the requirements of section
7024.1
(b) of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7024.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
